‚úÖ Led 39 colleagues in a letter to Senate leadership urging them to expedite a confirmation vote on @POTUS's nominee to lead the @ATFHQ. We must ensure the organization has a permanent leader to fight gun violence. https://t.co/b6J1ePPqcE

Today is #GunViolenceAwarenessDay. To say our country is reeling from the near constant news of gun violence is an understatement. 

Refusing to act is accepting this deadly status quo. We must #EndGunViolence NOW.

In most states in America you have to be:
21 to rent a car 
21 to drink alcohol
21 to enter a casino

But the day you turn 18 years old, you can buy an AR-15.

This is less than 24 hours after ANOTHER mass shooting in America, this time in Tulsa.

The carelessness and complete disregard that these radical, pro-gun GOP members display is revolting. https://t.co/K6sof4GETn

Thresholds is one of the largest providers of mental health services in IL, and my team was so proud to bring $1 MILLION in federal funding to this great organization. 

It was lovely to visit with these rockstars and discuss how they can expand their reach in our communities. https://t.co/xMt5BewHYF

We desperately need an ATF director to give this vital agency the leadership it needs to do its job.

It is time for Steven Dettelbach to be confirmed as the permanent leader of the @ATFHQ.

The ATF plays a critical role by partnering with local law enforcement to stop the illegal trafficking of guns and prevent acts of domestic terrorism.

However, the law enforcement agency has been without permanent, Senate-confirmed leadership since 2015.

In the wake of the mass shootings in Uvalde and Buffalo, it is crystal clear that we need a permanent leader at the @ATFHQ to fight gun violence.

I led 39 colleagues in a letter urging @SenSchumer to expedite a confirmation vote on @POTUS's nominee to lead the @ATFHQ.‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/BiuHY4r3M9
